name: Bizarre (Ethereal)
description:
Bizarre is a 2d art based mystery game.

You are Jhonny Reston and you are supposed to find out the owner of the artworks.

This is a small game and we are working on another protagonist also with a different variety of gameplay.

WASD-Movement

Mouse Hover to use See throught ability.

Space to Interact and Pass to the Next Line in Conversation.

Escape Button to Come out of Interactions,Paintings and ItemViewings.

Tab Button For Game tab and Pause menu.
